column4: does anyone know how to re-poweron an usb device after safe removal without detaching and reattaching it?
the device is still power off
if there isn't a refresh command or something like it, maybe some string to write in some file in /proc
it is an internal card reader and i cannot detach-attach it
ah write a hard inode or add it to fstab
the device is just powered off
ya I know all those ways should work -- even mount
the ways you wrote can work _ONLY_ if the device is still powered on
not if there is a hard node
why or how does the usb power off
well how does it stop working
because i safely removed the SD card
i did that with a wmodem back in 1998
